txt.en: The hobbits appear to have made a new friend
Gandalf believes you have the power to stir the sleeping shepherds of Fangorn
Gandalf wishes to speak with you atop Treebeard's Hill.

'Let me share some of my knowledge with you, [placeholder], for I believe that you came to this place tracking two old friends. They are friends to me also, and I know what became of them.\n\n'Believe it or not, this has a great deal to do with you.'
Gandalf wishes to speak with you.
'The hobbits are safe with Treebeard, but do you see what I see? The Ents have never seen hobbits before. Even the sleeping Ent you passed was interested in them.'
The hobbits are upon Treebeard's Hill.

'I trust you with this great deed, [placeholder]. I do not know for certain if your efforts will end in change, but I have hope.\n\n'Just talk to the Ents you find. Learn of their memories and help them piece together the riddles that occupy their slow minds.'
'I think I have told you enough, without telling you too much. Let us return to the present.'
Gandalf is at Treebeard's Hill in Fangorn.
Observe the fate of the two hobbits
